name: Syltherine
description:
Add a touch of comfort and sophistication to your space with this elegantly designed single chair. Whether placed in the living room, bedroom, study, or reading corner, it offers the perfect blend of style and functionality. The chair features a sturdy frame and plush cushioning that ensures lasting support and everyday comfort.

Upholstered in high-quality fabric or leatherette (depending on variant), this chair is built to complement a wide range of décor styles — from modern minimalism to classic interiors. Its compact footprint makes it ideal for small spaces, while its refined silhouette adds charm to any setting.
comments:
⭐⭐⭐⭐ Sneha R.

Beautiful

Adds a touch of elegance to my place. Very solid build.

Reviewed on 12 July 2025

⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ Karan V.

Perfect material

The finish is smooth and the design is clean.

Reviewed on 7 July 2025

⭐⭐⭐ Priya T.

Average finishing

Spacious, but the polish had minor scuffs. Delivery was on time and assembly was quick.

Reviewed on 3 July 2025

⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ Nitin A.

Great value for money

Looks premium. Totally happy with this purchase.

Reviewed on 18 July 2025
additionalinfo:
Seating Capacity:1 Seater
Frame Material:Solid metal frame with reinforced joints
Upholstery:Soft velvet fabric
Cushion Fill:High-density foam with fiber wrap
Assembly:No assembly required – comes pre-assembled
Warranty:24 months on manufacturing defects
Delivery Time:3–7 business days depending on location
Weight:Approx. 5 kg

name: Lolito
description:
Elevate your living space with this stylish and comfortable sofa, designed to blend seamlessly with modern or classic interiors. Crafted with a sturdy hardwood frame and upholstered in premium fabric, it offers exceptional durability and long-lasting support. The high-resilience foam cushions provide superior comfort, making it perfect for lounging, entertaining, or simply relaxing after a long day.

Whether you're furnishing a cozy apartment or a spacious home, this sofa delivers the perfect balance of design, function, and comfort. Its sleek lines, tailored finish, and neutral color tones make it a versatile centerpiece for any living room setup.

name: Grifo
description:
Add a warm and elegant glow to your space with the Grifo Night Lamp — a refined blend of rustic charm and modern sophistication. Featuring a sculpted wood-look base with antique gold accents, this lamp brings texture and depth to your bedroom, living room, or reading nook.

Topped with a classic white linen drum shade, the Grifo lamp diffuses light softly for a cozy ambiance. Its timeless transitional design makes it a perfect fit for both contemporary and traditional interiors, serving as both a functional light source and a statement décor piece.

Lampshade Material:Hardback white linen fabric

Weight:Approx. 7 lbs (3.2 kg)
Style:Transitional (rustic + modern blend)
Assembly:No assembly required
Warranty:1-year limited manufacturer warranty
